item.title: Effect of drug treatment on cellular metabolism (targeted LC/MS metabolomics analysis)
item.description: Introduction Setup Packages: Data: Abundances: Functions: Exploratory Analysis NA per sample and per compound Empty/Solv vs Sample Files Background Negative Mode Positive Mode Data prep and prelim analysis NA replacement and log transform Distribution plots: Negative Positive Exploratory PCA Background Negative Mode Postive Mode Surrogate Variable Analsysis and Signifiance Testing using Limma Negative Mode Positive Mode Interpretation Introduction This project is a walkthrough of a metabolomics analysis project that involves:

item.title: About
item.description: Setup I’m a PhD student in Pharmacology at the Weill Cornell Graduate School of Medical Sciences. My research focuses on applying LC/MS metabolomics to the study of folate-resistant neural tube defects, and the potential role of small-molecule metabolism in the development of birth defects. Thanks for reading!
